```{r}
#| context: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
library(shiny)

series_nombres <- c("MXN=X", "BTC-USD", "AAPL", "ABNB", "UBER")

series_tbl <- tidyquant::tq_get(
  x = series_nombres,
  get = "stock.prices",
  from = "2015-01-01"
)

series_tbl
```

```{r}
series_tsbl <- series_tbl |> 
  as_tsibble(index = date, key = symbol)

series_tsbl
```
